applicable_regulations: Patented Medicines (Notice of Compliance) Regulations, SOR/93-133
application_details: Applicants argue Exhibits D-G contain inadmissible hearsay or expand NOA
Respondent claims evidence meets reliability and necessity tests
result_of_case: Exhibit E, paragraph 33, and Exhibit G are struck
Other affidavits remain for trial judge's discretion
procedure_followed: Motion brought by Applicants to strike portions of affidavits
Court analyzed each affidavit under applicable rules
